page.title: 02BELLINGHAM BUSINESS.
page.content: We interviewed three local business people about their businesses.Most would prefer to use local materials but this is not possible.They employ between 5 and 10 local citizens.Most thought that Bellingham would become a retirement village rather than an industrial one.One thought that as Kielder Water increased in popularity,so Bellingham's trade would increase also. As business people their thoughts turn to unemployment,which they think is terrible.As private citizens their needs are fulfilled by the usual pubs,churches and local facilities that Bellingham has,but they all believe that for a happy environment the warmth and friendliness of Northumbrians are all that are needed.
